body: Renowned for its speed and agility, monkey style blends jumping strikes, rolling blows, and ground fighting into a continuous onslaught aimed at disorienting and damaging an opponent through superior mobility.Feat Path: Monkey Style, Monkey Moves, Monkey Shine.
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Combat/Rules/Feats/Types of Feats/Style Feats/Monkey Style
name: Monkey Style
